thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 7 of 289
thread.title: mike

author: mike
title: mike
text: I bought premium price tickets via SeatGeek engine and found out AFTER the purchase that they were General Admission tickets. I contacted Ticket City, actually spoke to a LIVE person, who went out of his way to help me work through the issue with the various parties involved. Very satisfied with the professional way he and his management dealt with and remedied the situation.
